title: Hito Toki Kiryu Ashikaga
sinopse: A Kiryu & Ashikaga heritage tourism promotion anime. Kiryu is located in the Gunma prefecture, Ashikaga is located in the Tochigi prefecture. The two cities are side-by-side (only a 30 minute car ride away) and share similar heritages. Each episode focuses on 1 season about the people (hito) and time (toki) of Kiryu and Ashikaga.
